title: Sick Game
body: So I queued up for a sick ranked game was ready to get my ranked game on, I join the lobby and old mate who got top asks hey man can i go mid, the mid laner replies nah mate i wanna play mid, so top lane starts abusing him, eventaully I tell him, hey mate, man up and play top, so our mid laner picks olaf, because he's bronze and then we join game and have 2 top laners and yasuo goes mid and feeds a ton and olaf i don;t think he had a monitor or a mouse.

replies.body: Screenshot in prior lobby, use end game report in the end results lobby, screen shot in-game, record video in-game, and use Riot support??? =/
Ahh bronze i will always love you forever <3
